Package be.kdg.parsing

Class SailboatsJaxbParser

java.lang.Object
be.kdg.parsing.SailboatsJaxbParser
public class SailboatsJaxbParser extends Object
This class provides methods for parsing XML files into Java objects using the JAXB library. It includes a method to write a Java object to an XML file and a method to read a Java object from an XML file.

  • Method Details

    • JaxbWriteXml

      public static void JaxbWriteXml(String file, Object root) throws jakarta.xml.bind.JAXBException
      Writes a Java object to an XML file. It creates a JAXBContext and a Marshaller for the class of the object. It then marshals the object to the file.
      Parameters:
      file - the name of the file to write to
      root - the object to be written to the file
      Throws:
      jakarta.xml.bind.JAXBException - if an error occurs while marshalling the object

    • JaxbReadXml

      public static <T> T JaxbReadXml(String file, Class<T> typeParameterClass) throws jakarta.xml.bind.JAXBException
      Reads a Java object from an XML file. It creates a JAXBContext and an Unmarshaller for the specified class. It then unmarshals the object from the file.
      Parameters:
      file - the name of the file to read from
      typeParameterClass - the class of the object to be read from the file
      Returns:
      the object read from the file
      Throws:
      jakarta.xml.bind.JAXBException - if an error occurs while unmarshalling the object
